name: LOVECOST
description:
My entry to the Ludum Dare game jam 44.

Your life is currency!

In fact, you play as a coin - falling through the clouds towards earth. You can pick up other coins to make you grow bigger - towards the unseen (and untested!) 50 kroner-note!

Or you can spend all your hard earned money on  -  LOVE.
Eventually you will fail.

But please post a picture of the 50-kroner note, if you reach that far!

Movement: A and D (Left and right)

M to mute music
ESC to exit.


You start at 20 coins.
